book.title: Youpi Handbook

sect1.title: &appname; Application Features
sect1.para:
Handy features are available out of the box. With &appname; you can:
Easily keep track of your data Tag FITS images with labels Prepare your tasks then save them for later processing by adding them to a shopping cart Define sophisticated rules to match only subsets of your Condor cluster on which you can run your processing jobs Monitor and kill your jobs running on the cluster in realtime from the interface Easily access all your output results Get statistics and generate reports

sect1.title: Getting This Book
sect1.para: Feel free to get a copy of this book from &youpiwww;. Both &pdf;, &html; and plain text file formats are available.
